text: Chris Rogers may refer to: * Chris Rogers (cricketer) (born 1977), Australian cricketer * Chris Rogers (jockey) (1924–1976), thoroughbred horse racing jockey * Chris Rogers (journalist) (born 1975), British newscaster * Chris Rogers (mathematician) (born 1954), mathematician * Chris Rogers (rugby player) (born 1956), South African rugby union player ==See also== * Chris Rodgers (born 1976), English golfer * Christopher Rodgers (disambiguation)
title: Chris Rogers
